text:
pulseData | Front-End Software Engineer | Onsite | New York City, New York, USA

Your role:

- Build and improve front-end display of our machine learning model

- Design chart review visualizations and UI components

- Build and own front-end projects from end to end

- Embed and integrate our software into reporting tools

- Actively adapt the latest libraries, tools, and techniques

Please apply here: https://jobs.lever.co/pulsedata/b23f46aa-86f2-45da-85d2-54bf...

pulseData uses health system data to build adaptive machine learning engines which identify patients at risk of poor health outcomes.
